message: Hello Bob, I am pleased to offer you this excellent product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $950,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product. I would like to propose a price of $750,000.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $750,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to negotiate, so how about we meet in the middle at $875,000?
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $825,000.
